properties.name: Chevron Richmond Refinery
properties.description: Major refinery; source of flaring incidents and 2012 vapor cloud fire.

properties.name: North Richmond
properties.description: Fence-line neighborhood shaped by redlining and wartime housing.

properties.name: Iron Triangle
properties.description: Dense residential area between rail lines; asthma rates above county averages.

properties.name: Richmond Shipyards
properties.description: WWII shipbuilding boom linked housing to refinery growth.
